title: Testing Beam Hard Fork On Local Testnet
description: Beam Clear Cathode 3.0 version includes a Hard Fork that will be activated in block 321321 (approximately around August 15th, 2019). As part of the fork, the mining algo will be updated to BeamHash II.

children.value: Beam Clear Cathode 3.0 version includes a Hard Fork that will be activated in block 321321 (approximately around August 15th, 2019). As part of the fork, the mining algo will be updated to BeamHash II.
Pools and Solo miners are strongly encouraged to test the version before that time using the latest versions of LolMiner and GMiner that already support BeamHash II.
